特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目:
Eastern European Economies, Economic History of the European Union, Introduction to European Economic History
This class is an English version of "EU Keizai-ron" which will be held in the first half of the spring semester. If you took any credit of "EU Keizai-ron", you are not allowed to take this class.
授業の概要・背景: The economic integration in the EU has given big impacts on the world economy as well as on the EU itself. And, it will give important lessons when Japan is willing to deepen economic relations with Asian countries. Students will not only understand the EU, but also widen their eyes when they reconsider, for example, the Japanese economy.
授業方法:
The class is held in face to face format. For students permitted to take classes online the class is distributed as simultaneous two-way class via Zoom. Class materials will be uploaded on LUNA.
The class is held by the quarter system (the first half of the autumn semester). The class will be held on 3rd and 4th slot of Thursday, and the examination will be given on the 3rd slot of 8th week.
If you have any questions, please ask them actively during or after the lecture.
